intro: Ophrestia, commonly known as the silverweed, is a genus of flowering plants in the family Polygonaceae. It typically features succulent, silver-gray leaves that are often covered in fine hairs, giving it a distinctive appearance. They are valued for their ornamental appeal and ability to thrive in challenging environments.
